Enhances YouTube searches with. It allows you to:

    Filter out Shorts: Customize search to exclude YouTube Shorts.
    Exclude Playlists: Easily remove playlists from search results.
    Control Video Length: Find videos that fit your time frame, from short clips to longer content.
